name: 5ideas.in
tag_list: seed-fund, accelerator, india, digital, internet, mobile, advisory, women-entrepreneurs, startup, startups, venture-capital, innovation, social
overview:
5ideas.in is a platform aimed at fueling the tech startup ecosystem in India through its multi-pronged offerings, the 5ideas Startup Superfuel Fund, 5ideas Advisory and 5ideas Founders-in-Heels initiative.

As the first initiative under the 5ideas brand, they have launched the 5ideas Startup Superfuel Fund, which is the first seed fund cum accelerator program in India for early stage digital businesses. The Startup Superfuel concept is based on investing a balanced combination of financial capital, human capital and social capital. Startups often face significant challenges on the human capital (people, experience & expertise) and social capital (business networks, ability to source talent) which are critical to take it to the next level. 5ideas addresses these gaps by working with the entrepreneurs and supporting their operations in addition to financial capital creating the formula for a growth superfuel for startups.

5ideas Startup Superfuel Fund is the first of its kind in India and will invest up to USD500K in selected startups, as well as deeply collaborate as operating partners with the startup teams for a period of 6 months to a year. In this year long collaboration program, 5ideas will also provide access to experienced mentors and valuable industry connections that will help set the right foundations for early stage businesses as well as accelerate their commercial growth. 5ideas partners will work hand in hand with the entrepreneurs through their early stage, helping accelerate their traction with customers and future institutional and corporate investors. With the right blend of financial and human capital, the 5ideas seed capital will deliver unmatched value to startups looking to build high- growth capital-efficient businesses.
